4620/A0/05/881/001.indicator_name: Percentage of children under age 4 years below income poverty line reached by ECD programmes.
4620/A0/05/881/001.headline: ECD programs have made important progress in recent years. Awareness regarding the importance of early stages of life have increased. However  as the Government recognizes  public policies should be enhanced to reach the defined objectives. UNICEF´s support to this process has been noteworthy and remains an important future task

4620/A0/05/881/001.indicator_name: Percentage of children under age 5 years who are overweight or obese
4620/A0/05/881/001.headline: ECD programs have made important progress in recent years. Awareness regarding the importance of early stages of life have increased. However  as the Government recognizes  public policies should be enhanced to reach the defined objectives. UNICEF´s support to this process has been noteworthy and remains an important future task

4620/A0/05/881/002.indicator_name: Percentage of children under age 5 years who are overweight or obese
4620/A0/05/881/002.headline: An agreement was reached with MOH to develop a national strategy to prevent NCD among children based in two components: a strategy to be developed together with education authorities to promote heathy eating habits and an initiative to promote food and beverages labelling and marketing regulations.

4620/A0/05/881/004.indicator_name: "b1c. Innovations to improve access and learning for the most disadvantaged children are implemented at scale and are sustainable - score (1-4)  see guidance"
4620/A0/05/881/004.headline: Innovative experiences and participatory political and social dialogue to impulse the reform of the curriculum for lower secondary education.

4620/A0/05/881/004.indicator_name: "b1b. Availability  within the education sector plan/policies  of a fully-funded strategy for identifying  testing and financing innovations in education - score (1-4)  see guidance"
4620/A0/05/881/004.headline: Innovative experiences and participatory political and social dialogue to impulse the reform of the curriculum for lower secondary education.

4620/A0/05/882/002.indicator_name: Number of responsible government bodies applying protocols to address violence against children  exploitation and abuse
4620/A0/05/882/002.headline: Prevention  detention and attention of violence against girls and boys in public policies. Capacity building on children rights protection trough training and knowledge exchange aimed to strengthen the justice system

4620/A0/05/882/003.indicator_name: Existence of procedures and services for children in contact with law that are applied and delivered in line with international norms
4620/A0/05/882/003.headline: Raise the awareness among policy-makers  judges and public opinion of the need to review and enhance the alternative sanctions. Facilitate exchange of successful experience in alternative sanctions.

4620/A0/05/882/001.indicator_name: Existence of an office for children in the National Institution of Human Rights
4620/A0/05/882/001.headline: Financial and technical support to the Institution of Human Rights to strength the monitoring of children detained  allowing to take prompt action when violation were detected

4620/A0/04/001/002.indicator_name: % de alumnos que asisten a Educación Media Básica (CES y CETP) cubiertos en programas destinados a alumnos con vulnerabilidad al fracaso escolar (PIU  CETP y Becas del MEC  entre otros)
% de asistencia educativa de niños y niñas de 3 a 5 años

4620/A0/04/001/003.indicator_name: Existencia de un Documento que dé cuenta de una Estrategia Nacional consensuada para el desarrollo de la primera infancia

4620/A0/04/001/004.indicator_name: Grado de avance en la implementación de los programas dirgidos a la primera infancia: Uruguay Crece Contigo  Canelones Crece Contigo  CAIF

4620/A0/04/001/005.indicator_name: % de niños de las áreas geográficas más pobres que asisten a las escuelas de tiempo pedagógico extendido (ETC)

4620/A0/04/001/006.indicator_name: % de alumnos que asisten a Educación Medida Básica (CES - CETP) cubiertos en programas destinados a alumnos con vulnerabilidad al fracaso escolar

4620/A0/04/003/005.indicator_name: Number of news articles related to the situation of children and adolescents

4620/A0/04/003/002.indicator_name: % programas de RSE que benefician a niños y adolescentes

4620/A0/04/002/004.indicator_name: Creación de un programa nacional para el fortalecimietno de las respuestas basadas en ámbitos familiares
Estrategia nacional para reducir en número de niños que viven en instituciones

4620/A0/04/002/003.indicator_name: Incorporación de materiales de promoción de pautas de crianza no violentas en políticas públicas para la infancia
Existencia de un módulo de formación en detección e intervención en casos de maltrato y abuso sexual infantil para futuros docentes de educación primaria

4620/A0/04/002/002.status_value: Existe un equipo pero aún es financiado por unicef
4620/A0/04/002/002.indicator_name: Existencia de un mecanismo independiente para el monitoreo de las condiciones de los adoelscentes privados de libertad consolidado
Number of juvenile detention centers which apply the United Nations Rules for the protection of adolescents deprived of their liberty

4620/A0/04/002/001.indicator_name: Observatorio de los Derechos de la Infancia y la Adolescencia publicado
Porcentage de informes país presentados en tiempo y forma durante el quinquenio 2011-2015.

4620/A0/05/883/002.indicator_name: Children aged 2-14 years receiving only non-violent disciplinary methods
4620/A0/05/883/002.headline: In complex issues as to eradicate violence against children  which involve cultural aspects  the key is to design a strategy that enables society to evolve into changing its conducts. During 2016 the UCO collected data in order to design a campaign for 2017.

4620/A0/04/001/001.indicator_name: Número de Centros CAIF que articulan acciones con ASSE y MSP
4620/A0/04/001/001.baseline_value: 55% de los Centros CAIF derivaron embarazadas para control de servicios de salud

4620/A0/04/001/001.status_value: Documento de Creación del Programa Uruguay Crece Contigo
